title: Relationship Q&A with Lauryn & Michael - Answering Relationship Questions Submitted by Listeners

description:
#158: On this episode Lauryn and Michael answer relationship questions submitted by listeners. Questions relating to jealousy, working together, marriage, traits that make a relationship work, and how to keep the spark alive.
